Single_Shot.display_help: A quick single shot from the Arachnos Sub-machinegun. Extremely accurate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Pummel.display_help: You can smash your opponents in close combat with the butt of your sub-machine gun to deal minor smashing damage. Pummel has a high chance to disorient your foe for a brief time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. It explodes into a field of sticky webs which slow and can immobilize all foes within its radius. Recharge: Long
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_attacker_hit: You attempt to immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}!
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to immobilize you with their {PowerName}!

Heavy_Burst.display_help: Fires a Heavy Burst of rounds at foes in a long cone in front of the user. Can also reduce the targets' defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT) Recharge: Medium
Heavy_Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Bayonet.display_help: Your weapon includes a bayonet attachment which you can use to stab at your enemies for lethal damage as well as causing them to bleed losing health over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Venom_Grenade.display_help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Long
Venom_Grenade.display_target_help: The poisonous gas has severely weakened your resistance to attacks.

Frag_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Frag Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your rifle. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Frag_Grenade.display_short_help: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

BS_Bash.display_help: You Bash with your mace dealing moderate Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
BS_Bash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
BS_Bash.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Mace_Beam.display_help: The Nullifier Mace has several different ranged attack modes. The Mace Beam is a moderate damage single target attack with a chance to knock a foe off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast

Mace_Beam_Blast.display_help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. The Mace Beam Blast is a Light damage area of effect attack, foes struck by the blast may be knocked back. Damage: Light Recharge: Medium
Mace_Beam_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Light DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

Mace_Beam_Volley.display_help: The Nullifier Mace can fire a volley of energy at all foes in front of the user. The Mace Beam Volley is a Moderate damage area of effect cone attack with a chance to knock foes off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Mace_Beam_Volley.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Pulverize.display_help: You are capable of Pulverizing a foe with your Nullifier Mace dealing high damage, causing toxic damage over time. Pulverize will occasionally disorient foes as well. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Pulverize.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
Pulverize.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Poisonous_Ray.display_help: You fire a Poisonous Ray from your mace causing damage over time as reducing the target's defense. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Moderate
Poisonous_Ray.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and your defense has been reduced.

Shatter.display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Shatter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), High Knockback

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, they will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

Crowd_Control.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down. NOTE: This power may deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Crowd_Control.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Knockback

Channelgun.display_help: Your backpack has a built in energy Longfang Channelgun which fires bolts of energy. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Channelgun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

Slice.display_help: The arms of your backpack may be used to slice at opponents for moderate lethal damage, as well as reducing their defense. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Slice.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Claws.

Longfang.display_help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire short bursts, causing greater damage. This attack also reduces your foe's defense. Damage: High Recharge: Medium
Longfang.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Suppression.display_help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire long bursts of energy, causing moderate damage in an large cone in front of you. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Suppression.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

Arm_Lash.display_help: The Crab Spider's backpack is capable of making rapid attacks with its many arms dealing heavy damage to foes within a short cone in front of the user. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Medium

CS_Venom_Grenade.display_help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Long
CS_Venom_Grenade.display_target_help: The poisonous gas has severely weakened your resistance to attacks.

CS_Frag_Grenade.display_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from an arm of your backpack. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
CS_Frag_Grenade.display_short_help: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

Frenzy.display_help: You can energize and lash out with your arms, causing both lethal and energy damage to all foes surrounding you. This attack also weakens the Defense of those struck. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Moderate
Frenzy.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the {Powername}.

Omega_Maneuver.display_help: You may use the Arachnos Teleportation system to summon an Omega Bomb in the midst of your enemies. The Omega Bomb immediately sends out a short range psionic signal and hypnotic light display to draw the attention of those nearby, causing them to approach the device. Then it detonates, causing massive damage to all enemies in a wide radius. Damage: Superior Recharge: Long
Omega_Maneuver.display_short_help: Summon Omega Bomb: Ranged (Location Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Foe Disorient
